CHAPTER 229

INCOME TAX

Table of Contents

Sec. 12-700. Tax rates.

Sec. 12-700. Tax rates. (a) The tax imposed under this chapter shall be computed as follows:

(1) For taxable years commencing on or after January 1, 1996:

(A) For any person who files a return as an unmarried individual:

Connecticut Taxable Income

Rate of Tax

Not over $2,250

3.0%

Over $2,250

$67.50, plus 4.5% of the

excess over $2,250

(B) For any person who files as head of household:

Connecticut Taxable Income

Rate of Tax

Not over $3,500

3.0%

Over $3,500

$105.00, plus 4.5% of the

excess over $3,500

(P.A. 95-160, S. 1.)

History: P.A. 95-160 effective for taxable years commencing January 1, 1996.

(Return to Chapter
Table of Contents)
